pkgmetadata.longdescription: Emoji Flags===========This is a Python package that takes the `ISO 3166-1`_: internationallyrecognized two-letter country code, and returns the countryâ€™s flag emojiand is inspired by the Node version by Matias Singers `Emoji Flags`_.Usage-----:: >>> from emojiflags.lookup import lookup >>> lookup('DE') 'ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡ª'.. _ISO 3166-1: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2.. _Emoji Flags: https://github.com/matiassingers/emoji-flags
